title: DND deployment fails with "DND content install failed for tenant..." error
content:
DND deployment fails. If you check the operation history, you see the following error message:

DND content install failed for tenant <tenantId>.

Cause

This issue occurs because network speed is low.

Resolution

  1. Upload the latest Content Packs to OO manually.
    • You can download the latest Content Packs from the ITOM Marketplace: Content Pack (CP) Deployer Tool.
    • For steps to manually upload Content Packs to OO, see Deploy and manage content packs.
  2. Â Redeploy the DND capability.
